sources.title: 1972 - The Ballad of Billie Blue - Lost soul, found purpose - Directed by Ken Osborne
sources.description:
Billie Blue (Jason Ledger) navigates life's potholes with dry wit and reluctant grit, finding unexpected allies in quick-thinking sidecick (Marty Allen) and steadfast Reba (Sherry Bain). Their bumpy journey through second chances proves redemption isn't a sprint‚Äîit's a soulful road trip where every detour reveals new meaning.

‚≠êÔ∏èSTARRING
Jason Ledger: Billie Blue
Sherry Bain: Reba
Sherry E. DeBoer: May Blue
Marty Allen

üé¨ CREDITS
Directed by Ken Osborne
Written by Robert Dix, William Kerwin & Ralph Luce
Release date: February 23, 1972

metadata.Plot: An emotionally touching story of a man who's life was in seeming disrepair, yet God turned it into one of redemption and atonement.
metadata.Writer: Robert Dix, William Kerwin, Ralph Luce
metadata.Actors: Jason Ledger, Marty Allen, Sherry Bain
